name: Code Blue (itch)
description:
Description

Play as a Nurse starting work at a nursing home where your only job is to give the patients their pills they need to survive on time. 

There are 6 levels with two possible endings.

This game was for the Mundane Game Jam and was made within 10 days. If you've got a minute it would mean the world to me if you could go and rate it HERE.

How To Play

Move - WASD/Arrows

Interact - E/Enter/Space

Sprint - Shift

Notes The first level can take a couple of seconds to load, just give it time.

I made some devlogs while creating this game over on my Creative Habit Jam page. You can go and check them out HERE.

I really went back and forth with tweaking the things that affect the difficulty, and I still don't think I got it quite right. The game does seem a bit difficult and I'm sorry I didn't have time to get it all right.

Credits Art:  LimeZu Music: James Hammond Sounds: MaskedSound VOiD1 Gaming Kenney Known Bugs
  • Can interact with some patients through walls
